attributes.title: Tik tok lives matter
attributes.review: Sorry but not sorry i do not want to loose tik tok and if hes really that worried about china having the app then why doesnt he just buy it himself 💀😔 its just like vine it died and everyone loved it so please dont take it from us or we will take this from you. Period

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: This app literally makes your phone glitch. the app doesn’t even work it took forever to download and my phone went orange when it finished downloading can’t believe y’all have all the money but yet can’t make a good app

attributes.title: If i could give zero stars i would!
attributes.review: When one of my fellow bird heads told me that mr. T was part of the birds don't exist movement I was certain I would vote for him... on this app I found nothing of the sort!      NO MORE PROPAGANDA!  Trump is a part of the scheme, he is watching us through the eyes of the birds! wake up people!

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: This app is a horrible app overall. It took about 2 hours for it to download even tho my WiFi works perfectly. Right when I opened the app it was very glitchy I’ve never seen an app so glitchy before.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: You tried you’re best❤️ being for real though, terrible app. I downloaded it and it installed a virus to my phone. My phone then blew up and caught my whole house on fire 😢. It gave me 3rd degree burns and now burned my cat in the process😡. Please get this off the App Store immediately!

attributes.title: terrible app 😭✨🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: i was in my car and i downloaded the app to serve and please the orange god until everything started to shake i got scared and from a distance i saw a army of rats coming my way they yelled at me to give a 5 star rating or else but unfortunately my finger had slipped so all of them had started charging at me with their tiny hair feet... i deleted the app as soon as i got a chance to escape the rats but i was lucky enough to get away. what a traumatic experience 1/5 stars do not recommend. 😪

What is this app sir your a horrible president you don’t need an app to tell you that and also is I’m tired of your orange self speaking just hush you get stupider ever time like it like you lose brain cells every time you speak. If you wanna ban TikTok your app is going first #SaveBarron2020 #Blacklivesmatter

attributes.title: stinky orange rat 😢🟠✨💕
attributes.review: it almost a month to download and when it finally did it started glitching a lot and it kept showing a orange 🟠 rat and a bunch of racist words would come up 😣😣 my family almost died from this app , DO NOT DOWNLOAD !! our racist / rapist president doesn’t deserve this 😢😢.  anyways stan tiktok 🥰🥰

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: It made my phone glitch sooo bad and even caused my phone to delete apps and pictures. I can not believe this. I would rather die than download this app again. The quality of the app was even horrible. And it kinda made my screen look a bit orange. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS ITS HORRIBLE!!!!!!😸😸😸😸😸

attributes.title: Gave my phone a virus
attributes.review: this app is just outrageous, I was hoping to find something to give me a reason to vote, this made it worse, it kept lagging and glitching out, so I couldn’t do anything on it, it even gave my phone a virus, im so upset that I thought if they were set
